Summary: Looked like a shooting star shooting across sky by Tyndall AF base
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were making a visit to a friend beach house in mexico beach not very far from the tyndall air force base in mexico beach florida. since our friend had not arrived yet we laid down in the bed of my truck and were looking at the stars in the sky since the sky was completely clear (this was my lame atempt to be romantic). it was 9:50 pm. all of the sudden my wife (then girl friend)saw what we thought was a shooting star. shot got my attention and i looked up to see it shooting across the sky going west at a very high altitude and speed (speed comparable to a shooting star). all of a sudden what we thought was a star changed directions instantly and shot north east, it changed directions again and shot south. it instantly shot back east and seemed to accelarate out of the sky at 5 times the speed as when we first saw it. it basically looked like it traveled in a triangle shaped figure in the sky before it shot out of view. \\ increased speed drastically here and left view \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \____<___\____<______<______\_____<____<<came into view here \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \\ this entire episode happened in about 10 seconds and it covered hundreds of miles of travel in no time. shortly after we could here several fighter jets take off tyndall afb. my wife and i never did speak of this to anyone else for fear people would assume we were crazy...
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mexico Beach
There were no other sightings in Mexico Beach on or around July 10th 2004
